spell.name: Mount Up
spell.description: Increases speed while mounted by 10%.  Not active in Battlegrounds or Arenas.

spell.name: Hasty Hearth
spell.description: Reduces the cooldown on your Hearthstone by 15 minutes.

spell.name: Guild Mail
spell.description: In-game mail sent between guild members now arrives instantly.

spell.name: The Quick and the Dead
spell.description: Increases health gained when resurrected by 50% and increases movement speed while dead by 10%.  Does not function in combat or while in a Battleground or Arena.

spell.name: Mobile Banking
spell.description: Summons a Guild Chest that allows access to your guild bank for 5 min.  Only guild members with guild reputation of friendly and above are allowed to use a Guild Chest.
